name: There is a GAME in your BUG
name_original: There is a GAME in your BUG
description:
ONLY READ FURTHER OF YOU ARE STUCK, THE INSTRUCTIONS CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR THE LEVELS

Level 1: use A and D or arrow keys to move around and Space to Jump

Level 2: use J and L  to move around , F to attack and Space to Jump

Level 3: 

Flappy player : Jump from 5 loops and then you can die after that to get to next level

level 4: the whole world is inverted go and touch the spikes to where the arrow is pointing to win
